title: Better promotion of opl ...
body: The stream should be on main page of LoL same as lcs ... because from what i understand majority of people dont even know the matches are on and that there is a stream..... since we achieved 175k points in less than 2 days there is more than enough people ... riot plz better promotion of competitive scene !! thx
